channel.title: Help- Rights, Levels and errors - IVE READ TUTS!
channel.description:
Ive read some tuts, And it only shows how to change the stats of the owner in Whitscape and stuff. How do i do it in Testscape
Now - It says its got errors - The main thing im worried about is the mod bit. - This is when im Compiling it. Because atm im not even a mod/admin..
client.java:30269: 'class' or 'interface' expected if(playerId == -1) out.write(7); // "This world is full." ^ client.java:30270: 'class' or 'interface' expected else out.write(returnCode); // login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban :-) ^ client.java:30271: 'class' or 'interface' expected out.write(playerRights); // mod level ^ client.java:30272: 'class' or 'interface' expected out.write(0); // no lo g ^ client.java:30274: 'class' or 'interface' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHa ndler.getPlayerCount() + " players."; ^ 5 errors Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

item.title: Help- Rights, Levels and errors - IVE READ TUTS!
item.dc:creator: @Lewlew1912 Lewlew1912
item.description:
@Lewlew1912 wrote:

Ive read some tuts, And it only shows how to change the stats of the owner in Whitscape and stuff.
How do i do it in Testscape

Now - It says its got errors - The main thing im worried about is the mod bit. - This is when im Compiling it.
Because atm im not even a mod/admin…

client.java:30269: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
if(playerId == -1) out.write(7); // “This world is full.”
^
client.java:30270: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
else out.write(returnCode);
// login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban
^
client.java:30271: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
out.write(playerRights); // mod level
^
client.java:30272: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
out.write(0); // no lo
g
^
client.java:30274: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now “+PlayerHa
ndler.getPlayerCount() + " players.”;
^
5 errors
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
